description.english: Collect 100 resources of any kind with Demeter's Obelisk!
description.german: Sammle 100 beliebige Güter mit Demeters Obelisk.
description.italian: Raccogli 100 risorse di qualsiasi tipo
description.spanish: ¡Obtén 100 recursos de cualquier tipo
description.russian: Соберите 100 единиц любых ресурсов с Обелиском Деметры
description.japanese: デメテルのオベリスクで\100個の資源を集める
description.dutch: Verzamel 100 willekeurige grondstoffen\met Demeters obelisk.
description.czech: Nasbírejte s Démétéřiným obeliskem 100 surovin jakéhokoli druhu!
description.brazilian: Pegue 100 recursos de qualquer tipo

description.english: Complete four bonus levels in Gold time!
description.german: Schließe vier Bonuslevel in Goldzeit ab!
description.italian: Completa 4 livelli bonus in tempo Oro.
description.spanish: ¡Completa cuatro niveles extra con tiempo de oro!
description.russian: Пройдите четыре бонусных уровня на золото
description.japanese: ゴールドタイムで4ボーナスレベルをクリアする
description.dutch: Voltooi vier bonuslevels binnen de gouden tijd.
description.czech: Dokončete ve zlatém čase čtyři bonusové úrovně!
description.brazilian: Conclua quatro fases de bônus no tempo Ouro!

description.english: Find 5 puzzle pieces!
description.german: Finde 5 Puzzleteile!
description.italian: Trova 5 pezzi del puzzle.
description.spanish: ¡Encuentra 5 piezas de rompecabezas!
description.japanese: パズルピースを5個見つける
description.dutch: Vind 5 puzzelstukken.
description.czech: Najděte 5 dílků skládačky!
description.brazilian: Encontre 5 peças do quebra-cabeça!

description.english: Find 5 or more hidden objects on a single level!
description.german: Finde 5 oder mehr versteckte Objekte in einem Level!
description.italian: Trova 5 o più oggetti nascosti in un singolo livello.
description.spanish: ¡Encuentra 5 o más objetos ocultos en un solo nivel!
description.russian: Найдите 5 или больше спрятанных предметов на одном уровне
description.japanese: 1レベルで5個以上の秘密アイテムを見つける
description.dutch: Vind 5 of meer verborgen voorwerpen in een level.
description.czech: Najděte v jedné úrovni 5 nebo více ukrytých objektů!
description.brazilian: Encontre 5 ou mais objetos ocultos numa fase!

description.english: Activate the 'Run Faster!' bonus with a complete Hermes' Obelisk!
description.german: Aktiviere den Lauf Schneller-Bonus, indem du Hermes' Obelisk fertigstellst.
description.italian: Attiva il bonus ''Corsa veloce!'' con un obelisco di Ermes completo.
description.spanish: ¡Activa el potenciador ''¡Correr deprisa!'' con un Obelisco de Hermes construido!
description.russian: Активируйте бонус 'Бежать быстрее' с построенным Обелиском Гермеса
description.japanese: 「移動速度アップ！」のボーナスを使ってヘルメスのオベリスクを完成
description.dutch: Activeer de bonus 'Sneller lopen' met een voltooide obelisk van Hermes.
description.czech: Aktivujte bonus „Běžte rychleji!“ navíc s Hermovým obeliskem!
description.brazilian: Ative o bônus 'Correr mais Rápido' com um Obelisco de Hermes completo!

description.english: Beat a Developer's Record 3 times!
description.german: Schlage 3x einen Rekord des Entwicklers.
description.italian: Batti un record degli sviluppatori 3 volte!
description.spanish: ¡Bate 3 récords del equipo de desarrollo!
description.japanese: 開発会社の記録を3回超える
description.dutch: Versla 3 keer een record van de ontwikkelaar.
description.czech: Pokořte třikrát rekordy vývojářů!
description.brazilian: Supere um recorde de desenvolvedor 3 vezes!

description.english: Beat a Developer's Record 20 times!
description.german: Schlage 20x einen Rekord des Entwicklers.
description.italian: Batti un record degli sviluppatori 20 volte!
description.spanish: ¡Bate 20 récords del equipo de desarrollo!
description.japanese: 開発会社の記録を20回超える
description.dutch: Versla 20 keer een record van de ontwikkelaar.
description.czech: Pokořte dvacetkrát rekordy vývojářů!
description.brazilian: Supere um recorde de desenvolvedor 20 vezes!

description.english: Collect resources 100 times or more from respawn points.
description.german: Sammle mindestens 100x Güter an Rewspan-Stellen.
description.italian: Raccogli risorse almeno 100 volte dai punti di rigenerazione.
description.spanish: Consigue recursos 100 veces o más de puntos de reaparición.
description.russian: Соберите ресурсы с точек респауна 100 или больше раз
description.japanese: 定期的に生産される資源から100回以上資源を集める
description.dutch: Verzamel minstens 100 keer grondstoffen uit vernieuwingen.
description.czech: Získejte stokrát suroviny míst, která se sama doplňují
description.brazilian: Pegue 100 recursos ou mais dos pontos de recriação.

description.english: Earn every achievement!
description.german: Erspiele alle Auszeichnungen!
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i trofei!
description.spanish: ¡Consigue todos los logros!
description.japanese: 全アワードを獲得
description.dutch: Behaal elke prestatie.
description.czech: Získejte všechna ocenění!
description.brazilian: Obtenha todas as conquistas!

description.english: Complete all levels in Gold time!
description.german: Schließe alle Level in Goldzeit ab.
description.italian: Completa tutti i livelli in tempo Oro.
description.spanish: ¡Completa todos los niveles con tiempo de oro!
description.japanese: ゴールドタイムで全レベルをクリアする
description.dutch: Voltooi alle levels binnen de gouden tijd.
description.czech: Dokončete ve zlatém čase všechny úrovně!
description.brazilian: Conclua todas as fases no tempo Ouro!

description.english: Complete the super-bonus level in Gold time!
description.german: Schließe das Superbonuslevel in Goldzeit ab.
description.italian: Completa il livello super bonus in tempo Oro.
description.spanish: ¡Completa el nivel de superbonificación con tiempo de oro!
description.japanese: スーパーボーナスレベルをゴールドタイムでクリアする
description.dutch: Voltooi het superbonuslevel binnen de gouden tijd.
description.czech: Dokončete ve zlatém čase extra bonusovou úroveň!
description.brazilian: Conclua a fase superbônus no tempo Ouro!

description.english: Complete 20 levels in Gold time!
description.german: Schließe 20 Level in Goldzeit ab.
description.italian: Completa 20 livelli in tempo Oro.
description.spanish: ¡Completa 20 niveles con tiempo de oro!
description.japanese: ゴールドタイムで20レベルをクリアする
description.dutch: Voltooi 20 levels binnen de gouden tijd.
description.czech: Dokončete ve zlatém čase 20 úrovní!
description.brazilian: Conclua 20 fases no tempo Ouro!

description.english: Collect 100 golds
description.german: Sammle 100 Gold.
description.italian: Raccogli 100 unità di oro.
description.spanish: Obtén 100 monedas de oro.
description.japanese: 金貨を100枚集める
description.dutch: Verzamel 100 goudstukken.
description.czech: Nasbírejte 100 zlata.
description.brazilian: Pegue 100 unidades de ouro.

description.english: Use 2 different bonuses together
description.german: Verwende 2 verschiedene Boni auf einmal.
description.italian: Usa 2 diversi bonus insieme.
description.spanish: Usa 2 potenciadores distintos al mismo tiempo.
description.japanese: 2つの異なるボーナスを同時に使う
description.dutch: Gebruik 2 bonussen tegelijk.
description.czech: Použijte dohromady 2 různé bonusy
description.brazilian: Use 2 bônus diferentes juntos.

description.english: Call upon 5 characters
description.german: Heuere 5 Charaktere an.
description.italian: Fai lavorare 5 diversi personaggi contemporaneamente.
description.spanish: Asigna una tarea a 5 personajes
description.japanese: 5人の作業員が同時に作業
description.dutch: Doe een beroep op 5 verschillende personages.
description.czech: Povolejte 5 postav
description.brazilian: Convoque 5 personagens

description.english: Use the same bonus again before its time runs out
description.german: Verwende denselben Bonus noch einmal, bevor Deine Zeit abläuft.
description.italian: Usa lo stesso bonus una seconda volta prima che si esaurisca.
description.spanish: Vuelve a usar un potenciador antes de que se agote.
description.russian: Продлите бонус до истечения времени действия
description.japanese: 時間切れになる前に同じボーナスをもう一度使う
description.dutch: Gebruik een bonus nogmaals voor de tijd om is.
description.czech: Použijte stejný bonus znovu ještě předtím, než vyprší
description.brazilian: Use o mesmo bônus duas vezes antes do tempo esgotar

description.english: Call upon 3 different characters simultaneously
description.german: Heuere 3 Verschiedene Charaktere an.
description.italian: Fai lavorare 3 diversi personaggi contemporaneamente.
description.spanish: Asigna tareas a 3 personajes distintos a la vez.
description.japanese: 3人の作業員が同時に作業
description.dutch: Doe een beroep op 3 verschillende personages tegelijk.
description.czech: Povolejte naráz 3 různé postavy
description.brazilian: Convoque 3 personagens diferentes simultaneamente.

description.english: Complete a level in Gold time without using any bonuses
description.german: Schließe ein Level in Goldzeit ab, ohne einen Bonus zu verwenden.
description.italian: Completa un livello in tempo Oro senza usare alcun bonus.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel con tiempo de oro sin usar potenciadores.
description.russian: Пройдите уровень на золото, отказавшись от предоставленных бонусов
description.japanese: ボーナスを1つも使わずにゴールドタイムで1レベルをクリアする
description.dutch: Voltooi een level binnen de gouden tijd zonder bonussen te gebruiken.
description.czech: Dokončete úroveň ve zlatém čase, aniž byste použili kterýkoli z bonusů
description.brazilian: Conclua uma fase no tempo Ouro sem usar bônus.

description.english: Workers must collect one resource after all the objectives are met.
description.german: Die Arbeiter müssen eins der Güter einsammeln, nachdem alle Aufgaben erfüllt sind.
description.italian: Gli operai devono procurarsi una risorsa dopo aver completato tutti gli obiettivi.
description.spanish: Los trabajadores deben obtener un recurso una vez completados todos los objetivos.
description.russian: Работник должен взять ресурс после выполнения всех заданий
description.japanese: タスクがすべて完了した後で資源を1つ集める
description.dutch: Werkers moeten na het behalen van alle doelen een grondstof verzamelen.
description.czech: Dělníci musí sebrat jednu surovinu poté, co byly veškeré úkoly splněny.
description.brazilian: Os operários devem pegar um recurso após concluir os objetivos.

description.english: Complete 5 levels in Gold time
description.german: Schließe 5 Level in Goldzeit ab.
description.italian: Completa 5 livelli in tempo Oro.
description.spanish: Completa 5 niveles con tiempo de oro.
description.japanese: ゴールドタイムで5レベルをクリアする
description.dutch: Voltooi 5 levels binnen de gouden tijd.
description.czech: Dokončete ve zlatém čase 5 úrovní
description.brazilian: Conclua 5 fases no tempo Ouro.

description.english: Build 3 obelisks on a single level.
description.german: Erbaue 3 Obeliske in einem Level!
description.italian: Costruisci 3 obelischi in un singolo livello.
description.spanish: Construye 3 obeliscos en un único nivel.
description.japanese: 1レベルで3つのオベリスクを建設
description.dutch: Bouw 3 obelisken in één level.
description.czech: Postavte během jedné úrovně 3 obelisky
description.brazilian: Construa 3 obeliscos numa fase.

displayName.brazilian: Pegue 5 recursos a mais dos solicitados nos objetivos.

description.english: Collect 5 more resources than the objective requires
description.german: Sammle 5 Güter mehr als die Aufgabe erfordert.
description.italian: Raccogli 5 risorse in più rispetto a quelle richieste dall’obiettivo.
description.spanish: Consigue 5 recursos más de los que exige el objetivo.
description.russian: Соберите на 5 единиц ресурсов больше, чем требуется в задании
description.japanese: ゴールに必要な資源の5倍の量を集める
description.dutch: Verzamel 5 keer meer grondstoffen dan het leveldoel vereist.
description.czech: Nasbírejte množství surovin o 5 a více kusů větší, než vyžaduje úkol
description.brazilian: Sobrecarga

description.english: Remove 4 obstacles using the 'Work Faster!' bonus!
description.german: Entferne 4 Hindernisse, indem Du den »Schneller arbeiten!« Bonus verwendest!
description.italian: Rimuovi 4 ostacoli usando il bonus ''Lavoro veloce!'
description.spanish: ¡Quita 4 obstáculos usando el potenciador ''¡Trabajar deprisa!''!
description.japanese: 「作業速度アップ！」のボーナスを使って4つの障害物を取り除く
description.dutch: Verwijder 4 obstakels met de bonus 'Sneller werken'.
description.brazilian: Remova 4 obstáculos usando o bônus 'Trabalhar mais Rápido'!
description.czech: Odstraňte pomocí bonusu „Pracujte rychleji!“

description.english: Finish level in Expert Mode and Gold Time having 3 seconds left!
description.german: Schließe das Level im Expertenmodus und in Goldzeit mit nur 3 verbleibenden Sekunden ab!
description.italian: Completa un livello in modalità Esperto e tempo Oro con 3 secondi restanti.
description.spanish: ¡Completa el nivel en Modo Experto y con tiempo de oro, con 3 segundos restantes!
description.russian: Пройдите уровень в Сложном режиме на золото с запасом в 3 секунды
description.japanese: ゴールドタイムの残り時間が3秒の状態でエキスパートモードでレベルをクリア
description.dutch: Voltooi het level in Expertmodus en binnen de gouden tijd met 3 resterende seconden.
description.brazilian: Conclua a fase no Modo Expert e Tempo Ouro restando 3 segundos!
description.czech: Dokončete úroveň v režimu experta a zlatém čase, když do konce zbývají 3 vteřiny!
